data.text: @SherryK28578827 @CityNewsVAN All those brain dead surgeons masked up for hrs & hrs every day...

@CityNewsVAN Information mis-presented. Many worry, some find it hard to cope, but the truth is most normal people don't care about it anymore. You shout be ashamed of what you've turned journalism into.

@CityNewsVAN It looks like BC has a different virus from the rest of the world, Bellingham, WA is dropping mandates as of next week but the British Columbian virus knows how to stay within BC....we should all get restaurant tables to be able to remove our masks, School desks must be replaced.

@CityNewsVAN Hey @CityNewsVAN how about taking a minute to report on the trial data info Pfizer just released under court order. Maybe mention how the vax death rate was higher than the virus and the terrifying nine pages of bad side effects. That’s the science. Why isn’t it making the news?

@CityNewsVAN Yeah because we haven’t seen any off ramp to the pandemic like most jurisdictions in the world, despite being the most vaxxed according to Bonnie Henry herself. Weird that if you tell everyone the sky is falling, some people believe you. 🤔🤦‍♂️

@CityNewsVAN Canada never had a Pandemic.  2020 No worse than any flu season.  Since vaccines came into play deaths have increased.  You should ref  Pfizer report they were forced to release last week. Propaganda news won't tell you.
